75: *Why You Want to Work Here:* We are the leading provider of contract cleaning services since 1976 to commercial and high security facilities. We provide our customers with tailored solutions and work across multiple industries. Due to our growth, we are currently seeking a bright and energetic individual to join our accounting team in our corporate office! *Responsibilities for Accounting Assistant:* * Monitor Accounts Payable mail boxes to identify vendor invoices to be paid, obtain approvals for and code vendor invoices, and voucher vendor invoices into accounting system for payment * Identify and calculate use tax on applicable invoices * Maintain vendor accounts and files, obtain and store W-9s, set up new vendors, and process 1099s at year-end * Obtain 1099 consulting agreements and ensure the consultants are paid in accordance with terms in agreement * Process and approve expense report reimbursements for payment in accordance with company policy * Communicate with co-workers, management, vendors, and others in a courteous and professional manner * Conform with and abide by all regulations, policies, work procedures, and instructions * Perform special projects and other finance and operations duties as assigned *Qualifications for Accounting Assistant:* * Completed Bachelors degree preferred * Accounting experience required * 0-1 year of relevant work experience * Strong attention to detail * High energy and team player mentality * Excellent verbal and written communications skills * Ability to perform in a fast-paced environment * Proficiency in Microsoft Office Applications including Excel, & Word *Benefits/Perks:* * Family oriented culture * Opportunity to learn from CFO and COO of the organization * Health, Dental, Vision, Disability, 401k + match, PTO * Hands on training from experts in the industry * Friendly and engaging co-workers * Extremely clean office * Open Parking #NOTGAJOB Job Type: Full-time Pay: $55,000.00 - $65,000.00 per year Benefits: * 401(k) * 401(k) matching * Dental insurance * Disability insurance * Employee assistance program * Employee discount * Flexible schedule * Health insurance * Life insurance * Paid time off * Vision insurance Schedule: * 8 hour shift * Day shift Supplemental pay types: * Bonus pay Ability to commute/relocate: * Alexandria, VA: Reliably commute or planning to relocate before starting work (Required) Experience: * Microsoft Excel: 1 year (Preferred) Work Location: In person by Jobble
